binaryOption.name: port_pcr_lk
binaryOption.toolTip: Locks Pin Control Register bits [15:0]\n This will apply until reset.

binaryOption.name: port_pcr_dse
binaryOption.toolTip: Drive strength configuration when in digital pin muxing modes\n with the pin configured as an output

binaryOption.name: port_pcr_ode
binaryOption.toolTip: Open drain configuration when in digital pin muxing modes\n with the pin configured as an output

binaryOption.name: port_pcr_pfe
binaryOption.toolTip: Filter configuration when in digital pin muxing modes\n with the pin configured as an input\n A low pass filter of 10 MHz-30 MHz is enabled on the digital input path

binaryOption.name: port_pcr_sre
binaryOption.toolTip: Slew rate configuration when in digital pin muxing modes\n with the pin configured as an output.\n Slow slew rate reduces EMI.

choiceOption.name: port_pcr_pull_mode
choiceOption.toolTip: Pull configuration when in digital pin muxing modes\n with the pin configured as an input
